acceptance-test-run.title: The @PodamCollection annotation should allow to set sizes on all collections and arrays
acceptance-test-run.name: thePodamCollectionAnnotationShouldWorkOnAllCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.CollectionAnnotationPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the List<?> [KNpDur63YP, 3sMEMbgR0K, HPE52Xoi8o, MCw2jZyFNs, lb2ezQ44ef] should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element
Then the List should have exactly 5 elements
Then the array should not be null or empty
Then the array should have exactly 5 elements
Then the Map<?, ?> {N35S48bC2N=s3iDtMdobp, o92CFRd6ZC=Mp6EgLAbQ0, YFS23fXso6=RrOunlyW8L, eD48WnCyie=TK5WuooTnh, BeOzLl84cG=gG5BBfWlel} should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly 5 elements
